Name: Daily Note Today

OpenOnStart.title: Open Today's Diary Automatically
OpenOnStart.text: Open Today's Diary automatically when the plugin is loaded

DefaultNotebook.title: Default Notebook
DefaultNotebook.text: The notebook where the daily note is created by default, use the first notebook if blank

update.title: Update Status
update.text: Update the status of the notebook when the notebook configuration changes

NotebookSort.title: Notebook Sorting Scheme
NotebookSort.text: 1. Same what document tree shows 2. Same the order defined in custom sorting mode

EnableMove.title: Enable "Move Block" in menu
EnableMove.text: When enabled, the "Move Block" item will be added to the menu after clicking on the block icon

EnableReserve.title: Enable "Reserve Block" in menu
EnableReserve.text: When enabled, the "Reserve Block" item will be added to the menu after clicking on the block icon

EnableResvDock.title: Enable "Show reservations" in dock menu
EnableResvDock.text: When enabled, the "Show reservations" pannel will be added to the dock menu at the right bottom side of the dock bar

ExpandGutterMenu.title: Expand all block menu items
ExpandGutterMenu.text: When enabled, the plugin's block menu items are expanded to appear as a separate secondary menu under the plugin menu

PopupReserveDialog.title: Popup Confirmation Window When Reserving a Block
PopupReserveDialog.text: Automatically displays a confirmation window when reserving a block to ensure the date is correct.

ResvEmbedAt.title: Insert reservations at
ResvEmbedAt.text: Insert reservations at top or bottom of today's daily note

RetvType.title: Insert reservations as
RetvType.text: Target block's type for reservations, could be embed block, link, or reference

InvalidDefaultNotebook:
Sorry, but the plugin can not find a notebook that corresponds to this ID; perhaps it is an illegitimate ID, or the corresponding notebook has been closed by yourself.

We suggest that you double-check the plugin's settings.

MoveMenu.NotLi: Only support moving entrie list, instead of signle list item!
MoveMenu.VerIssue: Current version dose not support "Move Blocks" function (â‰¥ 2.8.8))

ReserveMenu.name: Reserve this block
ReserveMenu.Title: Reserve this block to
ReserveMenu.Date404: No date time found for reserving!
ReserveMenu.DatePast: Can not reserve for past time!

Msg.Resv404:
Ooops!??

It should have been reservation blocks here, but the blocks are not found

Maybe they were deleted or the notebook is closed

part1: | Document ID | Title | Created | Updated | Notebook |
part2: You may have created a diary on another device before and then created a diary on this device, resulting in a synchronization conflict.
Please merge and delete redundant diaries manually: Open today's diary, locate the diary document, and the conflicting document will be nearby.
